title: Ticket #316: Green computing doesn't work
description: The green computing hibernate expression doesn't work for the first couple v7.2.x stable releases.
check_ins:
2009-Feb-26 11:21   Check-in [14007]: Fixed some wacky logic in the green computing code, the hibernation level was not being properly propagated though all the part of the code that needed it. (gittrac #316) (By Ben Burnett )
2009-Feb-24 15:50   Check-in [13981]: Fixed two bugs in the hibernation code. They are: 1) On Windows S5 (Shutdown) was being treated as S4 (Hibernation). 2) If any idle slot satisfied the HIBERNATE expression, it would put the machine into the sleep state given by HIBERNATE irespective of any active slots. (gittrac #316) (By Ben Burnett )
